p: We used test plant infectivity assays to examine the PVY NTN infectivity in water samples after the control and CAP treatments. We mechanically inoculated two leaves of individual tobacco ( Nicotiana tabacum, cv. ‘White Burley’) plants with nutrient solution (negative control), positive controls or treated samples. The inoculation process and growth conditions for the tobacco plants were as described in Mehle et al. ( 2014).
